sentences.sContent: It's the passage from Spenser's cave of Mammon canto that describes this same scene of violation, the violation of mother earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's the passage from Spenser's cave of Mammon canto that describes this same scene of violation, the violation of mother earth.
sentences.sCn: 这是斯潘塞笔下描写贪神之洞的长诗的篇章,它描述了对于大地母亲粗暴冒犯的场景。

remMethod.val: can (能) + to (到) → 能拿到舞台上朗诵的 → 长诗中的篇

trans.tranOther: one of the parts into which a very long poem is divided
